notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.

taskDescription:
Determine if  <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mfrac>
    <mn>8</mn>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mn>14</mn>
    </mrow>
  </mfrac>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\frac{8}{{14}}</annotation></semantics></math> and  <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mfrac>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mn>12</mn>
    </mrow>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mn>26</mn>
    </mrow>
  </mfrac>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\frac{{12}}{{26}}</annotation></semantics></math> are equivalent fractions.
detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>a</mi>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mi>b</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>8</mn>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mn>26</mn>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>208</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">a \times b = 8 \times 26 = 208</annotation></semantics></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>b</mi>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mi>c</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>14</mn>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mn>12</mn>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>168</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">b \times c = 14 \times 12 = 168</annotation></semantics></math>. The fractions are not equivalent.
